title: Jaycoinz
author: Jaycoinz
content: In Nigeria I think we want to go back to our old culture but the government would not say that.   Just imagine having money in ur account yet u can not access ur money, To withdraw no wayTo transfer no wayTo deposit no way.  I have come up with an idea since we can't have access to our money if u have rice give me rice I give u beans, if u have cash exchange it with any for what u need, my people chabi I tire.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Yes with the look of things in the present government now it seems like we are going back to old culture, of trade by Bater but it wouldn't work because The Nigeria of today is not Nigeria of then,we are in the modern life, which think like that can no longer hold because it will bring about alot of disagreement, The technology have open the eyes of every Nigeria we are wise now, and cannot allow such to happen, not that the system of exchanging goods to goods then is bad but what I'm saying is that then people were more understandable, on like now our eyes have open, greedness everywhere,then we were living like a brother and sister but now no more..

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 05, 2023, 05:43:02 PM   In Nigeria I think we want to go back to our old culture but the government would not say that.   Just imagine having money in ur account yet u can not access ur money, To withdraw no wayTo transfer no wayTo deposit no way.  I have come up with an idea since we can't have access to our money if u have rice give me rice I give u beans, if u have cash exchange it with any for what u need, my people chabi I tire.Trade by barter is your solution? I can tell you didn’t give this critical thought before posting, we really need to work on our topics here. The reason I think the trade by barter system won’t work is because times have changed, not necessarily for the better but we have a different society now. You’re referring to a time where every household had farmlands they cultivate, barns and silos in their compound, animal farms and so on. This generation cannot even plant a orange tree how do you propose they trade goods for goods? Would it be iPhone for a bag of rice?

The transfer system is working perfectly providing you have you preferred banking internet banking details or you have your mobile banking app. The trade by barter you propose is one of the most redeculous suggestion I have ever seen since the beginning of this new note wahala.It's kind of stressful for some of us to survive in this situation but trading a particular goods for the next is not an option at all.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Trade by barter can't work this time around, the society has out grown that stage in life, people are even so scared to share property this days, not to talk more of eatable items (rice beans etc) so it won't work, even if we try to give a try, e no no work...

We have advanced more than that level,it is time we accept the cashless policy system and think of how we can live with it. I do my transfers with online apps or pay a little more to withdraw from POS. As for me cash is still accessible if you need it. Most super market accepts transfer.

comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on February 05, 2023, 05:43:02 PM  I have come up with an idea since we can't have access to our money if u have rice give me rice I give u beans, if u have cash exchange it with any for what u need, my people chabi I tire.That is not your idea. It has been existing since before you were even born. In BY still, dat kind of trade dey exist till now. There is a market only for dat in BY so if u sae na ur idea den u v made a biggest mistake bi dat. Nd also 4 di cash scarcity, dis week di thing dey go strong pass bcoz na di targeted week bi dis. Going back 2 di old culture is not easy and it will not be possible. World Bank will not even allow dat to happen again. If dat happens then world Bank business e don spoil bi dat. U no know sae na di Currency exchange with goods dey give world Bank money. After di election everything go come back to normalcy. And business will come back to full Operation but the inflow of cash e no go dey like before again because dey wan to implement the cashless policy gradually now.
